name: WealthAdvisor
0:
”Alexa, Open My Wealth Advisor”
”When should I retire”
”Plan my retirement”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my wealth advisor
des: Wealth Advisor helps in financial planning related to investments, retirements and college education. It acts like a personal advisor who can plan you your savings. Just ask Wealth Advisor when you should retire or ask to plan for a retirement, it will plan for a perfect retirement for you. Need to save for Kid's college education but not sure how much you should save? Ask wealth advisor and it can give you the exact figure and where to save it. Whether it's for in-state or out-of-state or private college, wealth advisor can plan it for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
